ProductInfo.Features:

<7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
